newsitem.title: INDIA: Ten killed, 50 injured in India bus-truck smash.
newsitem.headline: Ten killed, 50 injured in India bus-truck smash.

text.p: Ten people were killed and 50 injured in northern India when the bus in which they were travelling collided with a truck, the Press Trust of India (PTI) said on Saturday.

Seven passengers died on the spot in the collision that took place on Friday at Mohiddinpur on the highway to Meerut, some 150 km (75 miles) from Delhi in the northern state of Uttar Pradesh, the news agency said.
Ten of those injured were in a serious condition, PTI said.
